title: Did Elvis ever meet The Rolling Stones? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, The Rolling Stones weren’t fans of an old man who has been on stage butt tooting. They would think his farting on stage during a performance was disgusting and crude.  Elvis here is demonstrating his prowess at karate and his butt tooting skills. The Beatles would be even more repelled by Elvis’ new image of lack of professionalism than The Rolling Stones. Because back when Elvis wasn’t tooting on stage back in the fifties, the Beatles idolized him, but they didn’t anymore after he died and then slightly before that as well.
